expo.name: PanHandler
expo.description: PanHandler - Precise CAD measurements from photos. Use coins for calibration, measure distances, angles, areas, and export to CAD software.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PanHandler uses the camera to capture photos inside the app before you publish them.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: PanHandler uses the microphone to record audio tracks that the app attaches to your creations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: PanHandler accesses your photo library so you can move media between the app and your library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: PanHandler saves media you export from the app into your photo library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: PanHandler uses your location to show nearby content and services while you use the app.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: PanHandler uses motion data to run movement-based features you enable in the app.

plugins.cameraPermission: PanHandler needs camera access to take reference photos for measurements.

plugins.photosPermission: PanHandler needs photo library access to save measurements and export images.
plugins.cameraPermission: PanHandler needs camera access to capture photos for measurement.

plugins.photosPermission: PanHandler needs photo library access to save measurements and export images.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: PanHandler needs permission to save measurement images to your photo library.
